DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether a GCT file specifying the path of the gene expression dataset was submitted.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A tab delimited, matrix file text format that describes a gene expression dataset; the columns of the matrix correspond to profiles, the rows correspond to genes, and the values of the cells correspond to an expression measurement._The specification of a node (file or directory) in a hierarchical file system, usually specified by listing the nodes top-down.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tab delimited, matrix file text format that describes a gene expression dataset; the columns of the matrix correspond to profiles, the rows correspond to genes, and the values of the cells correspond to an expression measurement.

Concepts.definition: A tab delimited, matrix file text format that describes a gene expression dataset; the columns of the matrix correspond to profiles, the rows correspond to genes, and the values of the cells correspond to an expression measurement.

Property.preferredDefinition: The specification of a node (file or directory) in a hierarchical file system, usually specified by listing the nodes top-down.

Concepts.definition: The specification of a node (file or directory) in a hierarchical file system, usually specified by listing the nodes top-down.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A protein or RNA whose structure is represented in and determined by genomic sequences.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated to support CTD2 activity per request by S.Jagu. mc 10/28/15

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether a GCT file specifying the path of the gene expression dataset was submitted.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A functional unit of heredity which occupies a specific position (locus) on a particular chromosome, is capable of reproducing itself exactly at each cell division, and directs the formation of a protein or other product. The gene as a functional unit consists of a discrete segment of a giant DNA molecule containing the purine (adenine and guanine) and pyrimidine (cytosine and thymine) bases in the ordered and correct sequence that encodes a specific functional product (i.e., a protein or RNA molecule).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for CTD^2 project per request by S.Jagu. Max length was intentionally left blank. mc 11/3/15 Changed from caBIG to CTD-2 for COOPERM by script 15-DEC-22 Moved from CTD-2 to OCG Context per request by S.Jagu. mc 2/1/17
